wordGroup: endemic fluorosis 地方性氟中毒

sentences.en: Today, this creature is known as the kangaroo, a widespread marsupial endemic to Australia.
sentences.cn: 今天，这种生物被称为袋鼠，是澳大利亚特有的有袋动物。

sentences.en: Corruption is endemic in the system.
sentences.cn: 腐败在这种制度下普遍存在。

sentences.en: Malaria is endemic in many hot countries.
sentences.cn: 疟疾是许多气候炎热国家的流行病。
